descriptionHtml:
[center][size=30]Spoilers Ahead![/size][/center]

[center]
[size=5][color=blue]If you already have Miraaks Mask drop it and pick  it back up. If that doesn\'t work revert back to an older save before you killed Miraak and kill him again. [/color][/size][/center]

[center]The DragonBorn dlc is obviously required.[/center]

[center]This mods fixes Miraaks Mask and allows you to use Benthic Scream.
When you equip the mask for the first time a shout will be added called Benthic Scream.
The shout is only usable when wearing the mask.
Yes, the shout only has 1 word.

I added a Balanced version of the shout, it adds a 15 cool down to the shout.[/center]

[center]Video of me using the shout:
[youtube]KgHauf-wkPg[/youtube][/center]

Have fun!
author: LoveAlice
